flavor.description: Defeat the fleecy foe Sheep Man and his band of electric goons in this nightmarish Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Sheep Man using only Neutral-type abilities you'll unlock him! Good luck!

Weather the rainstorm to defeat Dynamo Man and his knot of slippery cohorts in this shocking Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Dynamo Man using only Neutral-type abilities, you'll unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

11.name: Faster Than the Speed of Sound

flavor.description: Think fast if you want to defeat Fuse Man and his charge of speedy brethren in this sparking Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Fuse Man using only Neutral-type abilities, you'll unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

Bring your A-game if you want to defeat Aqua Man and his team of super cool dudes in this splashing Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Aqua Man using only Neutral-type abilities, you'll unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

Take on Pump Man and his team of Witty And Totally Excellent Robots in this wet and highly shield-focused Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Pump Man using only Neutral-type abilities, you'll unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

Feel the burn of Acid Man's chemical weapons as you fight against him and his shady friends in this bio-hazard of a Special Event Mission! If you can defeat Acid Man using only Neutral-type abilities, you'll unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

Solar Man gets his shot at redemption! Train hard if you want to defeat him and his gang of pumped-up workout buddies in this blazing Special Event Mission! Defeat Solar Man using only Neutral-type attacks to unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

With a calvary of rabid hornets and Robot Masters at his side, Hornet Man's reclaimed the wilds in order to create a perfect polli-nation! Defeat Hornet Man using only Neutral-type attacks to unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

Plant Man is holding a secret garden party for him and his closest friends, but apparently you've come to crash it - how rude! Anyway, defeat Plant Man using only Neutral-type attacks to unlock him for use in battle! Good luck!

An eclectic group of gemstone-based robots have appeared from outer-space and challenged you to a battle for control of Earth's resources! Defeat Crystal, Gemini, and Jewel... and Star Man(?) within the turn limit to win the battle and save the planet!

The seas replicated within the Prototype are vast -- and Pirate Man's laid claim to them all! Calling himself the 'Scourge of the Seven Seas', he's begun a new era of terror and pilfering! Defeat his crew, and the scourge himself, to give the ocean order!

As an artist, Blast Man seeks to paint the world in explosions -- and he's looking to make you his greatest masterpiece! And with a team born from his own artist ego, he's no easy foe! Defeat the many Blast Men to keep the Prototype from being his canvas!

23.name: And Yet the Earth Does Move

flavor.description: Blizzard Man and a cast of competitors have taken up their winter gear for olympic glory, but these skiing scoundrels have dominated winter sports for far too long! Take up their chilly challenge and give them a gold medal performance! Good luck!

With over a thousand foes in combat bested, Knight Man lays down the gauntlet -- he challenges every capable fighter in the Prototype to a duel! Claim your knighthood by defeating him and his united group of tournament world warriors! Good luck!
You've accidently invited Shade Man and his coven into your home at the crack of dawn. Can you overcome their vampiric onslaught and vanquish their curse before the sun sets?
Waves crash at Ganryu. --- The samurai waits for you. --- Good luck, young ronin!

Charge Man's still pretty steamed for not being invited to play Soccer the last time -- hadn't they seen his Charge Kick? As a result, Charge Man's taken over the field for an impromptu Soccer game! Stop this runaway train, and go score on his team too!

Wood Man is a pacifist, so don't expect him to be throwing any punches. He'll be content to sit there, absorbing all of your attacks. What strategies can you can up with to cut him down as quickly as possible? Good luck!

Almost only counts in horseshoes and handgrenades... but don't even try when it comes to handgrenade horseshoes! It's the worst party game ever -- try and stop Grenade Man with only neutral-core abilities to put an end to his dynamite-cocktail days!
There is no themeing, no newly unlockable Robot Masters, just a well rounded team for you to fight. Good luck!

Sword Man challenges the strongest among your robots to best him and his trials -- nothing more, nothing less. Defeat him using only neutral-type attacks, and he's sure to recognize your resolve. Just remember -- there are no second chances.

This get-together of Robot Masters has caused the weather to go absolutely haywire! Every cloud has a silver lining though -- defeat Cloud Man using only neutral-core attacks, and maybe that'll motivate this couch potato to join your cause! Good luck!

There are many martial artists in the Prototype, and Wind Man's gathered the greatest of them all to challenge the doctors! Win against him with neutral-core attacks, and he'll join your side -- lose, and you have to help out with his harvest! Good luck!

Dust Man is behind on his janitorial duties, so he has assembled a clean dream team to help him take out the trash. Don't blow it! NOTE: This challenge was partially developed as a collaborative effort with the Mega Man RPG Prototype community.

Reported data suggests that the great warrior, Tomahawk Man, has been in hiding within the Prototype. His power, however, would be invaluable in escaping this digital world. Defeat this lone wolf using only neutral-type abilities and his strength is yours!

Nitro Man's stunt club are chasing their greatest feat yet -- destroying the doctors! There's no special effects or wirework, no stunt pads.. this is as real as a stunt gag gets! Show these daredevils what for, and remember -- don't try this at home!

"kZZZtt.. g̵A̴l̸a̴x̶Y̷ ̸.̷z̷ ̴M̶-̸a̸n̸ ̶h̶-̸-̷e̷r̴e̷e̸e̴ ̵k̴z̴t̶t̷.̵.̶.̸ ̶r̵a̴n̸ ̶i̸n̷t̷o̵ KZZT .̴.̵ ̸u̶n̴i̵d̶e̵n̶t̸i̵f̷i̴e̸d̵ ̶h̶o̸s̶t̴i̷l̴e̵s̶ ̸o̷n̷ ̶l̷a̷s̸t̶ ̶s̴c̷o̵u̶t̴i̴n̷g̶ ̸m̶i̵s̷s̵i̸o̶n̸.̶.̸.̴ ̶I̴ ̵I n̴e̶e̵d̶ ̶ ̶i̷m̸m̶e̸d̶i̷a̷t̴e̶ ̸b̵a̶c̵k̸u̸p̵!"

What's this? The Prototype's CPU usage is reaching near-critical levels... Oh no! It looks like Freeze Man is copying Ice Man's data on mass, just to seek their approval and attention! Don't give him a chance to show off his victory pose, stop this maniac!

Welcome to Bounce Man's all-ages Hopxercise class at the new and fully digitally-recreated Boing Boing Park! Burn calories in style as you dodge fitness medicine balls! Defeat Bounce Man with neutral-core attacks, and he'll join you - all fees waived!

Let's run it back - Turbo Man's started his own all-new Battle and Chase competition, with all new vehicle racers! Well, it might actually be kinda tough to outspeed Turbo Man.. so just focus on the battle part! Watch out for his Scorch Wheel!

Commando Man wants you to take on the challenge of his hellish bootcamp! He's built army strong, and he's looking to train warriors with enough strength, will, and faith to join him in battle. Do your best - do or die!

Large portions of the Prototype are being drowned in rain water, and data points to it originating from a severe rainstorm generating from a gang of Toad Men. Bring your umbrellas, robots and doctors -- things are about to get wet and wild!
Horror movies!

53.name: Legacy Collection 2: The Mystery of Dr. Wily

54.name: Legacy Collection 3: The End of Dr. Wily!?

55.name: Legacy Collection 4: A New Evil Ambition!!

57.name: Legacy Collection 6: The Greatest Battle of All Time!!
